ch0126_41_haruka/0101_0701_02_10:
I wonder what wonderful encounters are in store
for us today! I can’t wait!
ch0126_41_haruka/7101_0701_01_10:
I’m not used to wearing outfits like this, since it’s
not my usual style.
ch0126_41_haruka/7101_0701_02_10: I feel like I’m lightly floating...
ch0126_41_haruka/7101_0701_03_10: It’s almost as if I’m flying through the sky on Latias!
ch0126_41_haruka/7102_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I do fieldwork on my own, but other
times, I go with my father.
ch0126_41_haruka/7102_0701_02_10:
Can you imagine my father’s face if he saw
this outfit?
ch0126_41_haruka/7102_0701_03_10: Would he be surprised? What do you think?
ch0126_41_haruka/7103_0701_01_10:
Ever since I met Latias, the world feels larger
than before.
ch0126_41_haruka/7103_0701_02_10:
I want to experience lots of exciting new things
I’ve never done before, even on Pasio.
ch0126_41_haruka/7104_0701_01_10:
There are lots of people out doing fieldwork, like
Cynthia and Bianca!
ch0126_41_haruka/7104_0701_02_10:
You seem to be good friends with both of them.
Have you ever tagged along on their fieldwork?
ch0126_41_haruka/7104_0701_03_10:
Maybe I’ll join them next time to study
their methods!
ch0126_41_haruka/7105_0701_01_10:
I make sure to remember the days I make
new friends!
ch0126_41_haruka/7105_0701_02_10:
I remember the days I met Brendan and
Latias...and you, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0126_41_haruka/7105_0701_03_10:
They are important anniversaries! No way
I’d forget!
ch0126_41_haruka/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are! Please, take this!
ch0126_41_haruka/1701_0702_01_10: I hope you find it useful!
ch0126_41_haruka/2501_0701_01_10:
When I wear this outfit, my Pokémon
get a little fidgety.
ch0126_41_haruka/2501_0701_02_10:
Maybe it’s because these clothes don’t match 
my usual vibe?
ch0126_41_haruka/2501_0701_03_10:
Oh, but I think Latias likes how I look in
this dress!
ch0126_41_haruka/2501_0702_01_10:
Brendan also acts like a stranger when I’m
wearing a dress.
ch0126_41_haruka/2501_0702_02_10: But I’m still me, even if my outfit has changed.
ch0126_41_haruka/2511_0701_01_10:
I think the first step in becoming friends with
someone might be to learn more about them.
ch0126_41_haruka/2511_0701_02_10:
That’s why doing fieldwork to learn about the
ecosystems Pokémon live in is an important first
step to becoming friends with them!
ch0126_41_haruka/2511_0701_03_10:
I want to be friends with Pokémon from
all around the world someday!
ch0126_41_haruka/2511_0702_01_10:
Although, maybe it’s better to not get too focused
on becoming friends.
ch0126_41_haruka/2511_0702_02_10:
Sometimes I’ll realize I’ve made an important
friend without even trying!
ch0126_41_haruka/2511_0702_03_10: That’s how it was for me and you, after all!
ch0126_41_haruka/3001_0701_01_10:
When something good happens first thing in the
morning, it brightens up my whole day!
ch0126_41_haruka/3003_0701_01_10:
I love this outfit so much! Do you think I’d stand
out too much if I wore it outside to do fieldwork?
ch0126_41_haruka/3005_0701_01_10:
I had such an amazing day today! I bet when
I go to sleep, my dreams will be full of fun
adventures, too!
